time conversion

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

MJD[source]

MJD(met)

convert MET to MJD

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

UTC[source]

UTC(mjd)

convert MJD value to ISO date string

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert UTC(MJD(0))=='2001-01-01 00:01'
{% endraw %}

Configuration data classes

{% raw %}

class LCconfig[source]

LCconfig(verbose:int=3, mjd_range:Tuple=None, radius:float=5, cos_theta_max:float=0.4, z_max:float=100, time_interval:int=1, nside:int=1024, nest:bool=True, bins_per_decade:int=4, base_spectrum:str='lambda E: (E/1000)**-2.1', energy_range:Tuple=(100.0, 1000000.0))

light curve configuration parameters

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FileConfiguration[source]

FileConfiguration(data:str='$HOME/data', ft2:str=`'$HOME/work/lat-data/ft2/.fits'*, **gti**:str=*'$HOME/work/lat-data/binned/*.fits'`*, **`aeff`**:`str`=*`'$HOME/work/lat-data/aeff'*, **weights**:str=*'$HOME/onedrive/fermi/weight_files'*, **cache**:str=*'/tmp/light_curves'`*)

FileConfiguration(data: str = '$HOME/data', ft2: str = '$HOME/work/lat-data/ft2/.fits', gti: str = '$HOME/work/lat-data/binned/.fits', aeff: str = '$HOME/work/lat-data/aeff', weights: str = '$HOME/onedrive/fermi/weight_files', cache: str = '/tmp/light_curves')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
files = FileConfiguration()
print(f"Files are {'valid' if files.valid else 'not valid'}")

Files are valid
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class PointSource[source]

PointSource(name, position=None)

Manage the position and name of a point source

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

PointSource.fk5[source]

PointSource.fk5(name, position)

position: (ra,dec) tuple

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for s, expect in [( PointSource('Geminga'),             'Source "Geminga" at: (l,b)=(195.134,4.266)'),
                  ( PointSource('gal_source', (0,0)),   'Source "gal_source" at: (l,b)=(0.000,0.000)', ),
                  ( PointSource.fk5('fk5_source',(0,0)),'Source "fk5_source" at: (l,b)=(96.337,-60.189)',)
                   ]:    
    assert str(s)==expect, f'expected {expect}, got {str(s)}'
{% endraw %}
